mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents (application_id, document_type, document_no, issued_by, payload_json) VALUES (#{applicationId}, #{documentType}, #{documentNo}, #{issuedBy}, #{payloadJson})
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS documentId, d.application_id AS applicationId, d.document_type AS documentType, d.document_no AS documentNo, d.issued_by AS issuedBy, d.issued_at AS issuedAt FROM documents d WHERE d.application_id = #{applicationId} AND d.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY d.issued_at DESC, d.id DESC
